title: One word messages
data:
|                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
| -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [ ]## Contents* [1 Sound effects](#Sound_effects)

* [2 Player actions](#Player_actions)

  - [2.1 Kicking](#Kicking)
  - [2.2 Dropping](#Dropping)
  - [2.3 Locking](#Locking)
  - [2.4 Digging](#Digging)
  - [2.5 Teleporting](#Teleporting)
  - [2.6 Combat](#Combat)
  - [2.7 Other](#Other)

* [3 Monster noises](#Monster_noises)

  - [3.1 Chatting](#Chatting)
  - [3.2 Mail daemon](#Mail_daemon)

* [4 Miscellaneous](#Miscellaneous)

* [5 References](#References) |

This page is a list of one-word [messages](/wiki/Message "Message").

## Sound effects

"Boing!" – A creature with [magic resistance](/wiki/Magic_resistance "Magic resistance") was hit by a [wand of striking](/wiki/Wand_of_striking "Wand of striking") or spell of [force bolt](/wiki/Spellbook_of_force_bolt "Spellbook of force bolt").[\[1\]](#cite_note-1)[\[2\]](#cite_note-2)[\[3\]](#cite_note-3)[\[4\]](#cite_note-4)

"Splat!" – An [egg](/wiki/Egg "Egg") or [melon](/wiki/Melon "Melon") broke. Could be due to throwing it, or it being destroyed by a force bolt or wand of striking while in inventory.[\[5\]](#cite_note-5)

"Splash!" – [Venom](/wiki/Venom "Venom") was thrown.[\[6\]](#cite_note-6)

"Crash!" – A [potion](/wiki/Potion "Potion") hit a monster that you can't see.[\[7\]](#cite_note-7)

"Whang!" – A [boulder](/wiki/Boulder "Boulder") or [iron ball](/wiki/Iron_ball "Iron ball") hit [iron bars](/wiki/Iron_bars "Iron bars").[\[8\]](#cite_note-8)

"Clink!" – [Gold](/wiki/Gold "Gold") hit iron bars.[\[9\]](#cite_note-9)

"Clonk!" – Some other kind of thrown object hit iron bars.[\[10\]](#cite_note-10)

## Player actions

### Kicking

"Thwwpingg! – You [kicked](/wiki/Kick "Kick") a pile of gold and sent some of them flying.[\[11\]](#cite_note-11)

"Thump!" – You [kicked](/wiki/Kick "Kick") a pile of gold larger than 300 zorkmids and none of them went flying.[\[12\]](#cite_note-12)

"THUD!" – You [kicked](/wiki/Kick "Kick") a [large box](/wiki/Large_box "Large box") or a [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest") and it did not move because it is either too heavy or against a wall.[\[13\]](#cite_note-13)

"Thump!" – You [kicked](/wiki/Kick "Kick") some other object, but the object did not move because it is either too heavy or against a wall.[\[14\]](#cite_note-14) If a [gray stone](/wiki/Gray_stone "Gray stone") is not against the wall, then "Thump!" identifies it as a [loadstone](/wiki/Loadstone "Loadstone").

"Klunk!" – You kicked a [sink](/wiki/Sink "Sink") and you are deaf.[\[15\]](#cite_note-15)

"WHAMMM!!!" – You kicked a [door](/wiki/Door "Door"), but it didn't break.[\[16\]](#cite_note-16)

### Dropping

"Splash!" – You dropped a heavy object ([weight](/wiki/Weight "Weight") 10 or more) into a [pool](/wiki/Pool "Pool").[\[17\]](#cite_note-17)

"Plop!" – You dropped a light object (weight 9 or less) into a pool while [levitating](/wiki/Levitating "Levitating") or [flying](/wiki/Flying "Flying") over it.[\[18\]](#cite_note-18)

### Locking

"Klunk!" – A spell of [wizard lock](/wiki/Spellbook_of_wizard_lock "Spellbook of wizard lock") or a [wand of locking](/wiki/Wand_of_locking "Wand of locking") [locked](/wiki/Lock "Lock") a [box](/wiki/Box "Box") or a [chest](/wiki/Chest "Chest").[\[19\]](#cite_note-19)

"Klick!" – A spell of [knock](/wiki/Spellbook_of_knock "Spellbook of knock") or a [wand of opening](/wiki/Wand_of_opening "Wand of opening") unlocked a box or a chest.[\[20\]](#cite_note-20)

### Digging

"Clash!" – You tried to [dig](/wiki/Dig "Dig") outside the map area with a [pick-axe](/wiki/Pick-axe "Pick-axe").[\[21\]](#cite_note-21) (This is possible only if the diggable area of the level extends all the way to the edge of the map.)

"Clang!" – You tried to dig through [iron bars](/wiki/Iron_bars "Iron bars") with a pick-axe.[\[22\]](#cite_note-22)

### Teleporting

"Sorry..." – You attempted a [controlled teleport](/wiki/Teleport_control "Teleport control") into an invalid or unsafe location,[\[23\]](#cite_note-23) or you attempted to [level teleport](/wiki/Level_teleport "Level teleport") into (or below) the [Sanctum](/wiki/Sanctum "Sanctum") before performing the [invocation](/wiki/Invocation "Invocation").[\[24\]](#cite_note-24)

"Oops..." – You attempted a controlled level teleport while [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused") and ended up on a random level instead.[\[25\]](#cite_note-25)[\[26\]](#cite_note-26)

### Combat

"Splash!" – You hit an eyeless monster with [blinding venom](/wiki/Blinding_venom "Blinding venom"), or you hit a monster with blinding venom while you were blind.[\[27\]](#cite_note-27)[\[28\]](#cite_note-28)

"Splat!" – You hit a monster with an ordinary [egg](/wiki/Egg "Egg"),[\[29\]](#cite_note-29) or same as above, but you hit the monster with a [cream pie](/wiki/Cream_pie "Cream pie").[\[30\]](#cite_note-30)[\[31\]](#cite_note-31)

"Snap!" – You [applied](/wiki/Apply "Apply") a [bullwhip](/wiki/Bullwhip "Bullwhip") but hit nothing.[\[32\]](#cite_note-32)

### Other

"Whoops..." – You failed to [untrap](/wiki/Untrap "Untrap") a [trap](/wiki/Trap "Trap") and just made things worse.[\[33\]](#cite_note-33)

## Monster noises

"Surrender!" – A possible message from an angry [soldier](/wiki/Soldier "Soldier").[\[34\]](#cite_note-34)

"Gleep!" – A tame baby [dragon](/wiki/Dragon "Dragon") hatched from an [egg](/wiki/Egg "Egg").[\[35\]](#cite_note-35) This is a reference to the *[MythAdventures](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MythAdventures "wikipedia:MythAdventures")* series of books by Robert Asprin.

"Burrrrp!" – A monster with a [digestion attack](/wiki/Digestion_attack "Digestion attack") swallowed another monster.[\[36\]](#cite_note-36)

"Gasp!" / "What?" / "Why?" – A [peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful") monster saw you attack another peaceful monster.[\[37\]](#cite_note-37)

### Chatting

"Nevermore!" – [Chat](/wiki/Chat "Chat") with a non-[peaceful](/wiki/Peaceful "Peaceful") [raven](/wiki/Raven "Raven").[\[38\]](#cite_note-38) This is a reference to Edgar Allan Poe's poem "[The Raven](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/The_Raven "wikipedia:The Raven")".

"Huh?" / "What?" / "Eh?" – Chat with a [stunned](/wiki/Stunned "Stunned") or [confused](/wiki/Confused "Confused") peaceful [humanoid](/wiki/Humanoid "Humanoid").[\[39\]](#cite_note-39)

"Aloha." – Chat with a peaceful [tourist](/wiki/Tourist_\(player_monster\) "Tourist (player monster)").[\[40\]](#cite_note-40)

### Mail daemon

"Gangway!" – A message the [mail daemon](/wiki/Mail_daemon "Mail daemon") says when pushing monsters out of its way.[\[41\]](#cite_note-41)

"Catch!" – The mail daemon can't reach you, so it throws the [scroll of mail](/wiki/Scroll_of_mail "Scroll of mail") at you.[\[42\]](#cite_note-42)

"Oops!" – You failed to pick up the scroll of mail for some reason, e.g. because you [fumbled](/wiki/Fumble "Fumble") or because your [inventory](/wiki/Inventory "Inventory") was full.[\[43\]](#cite_note-43)

## Miscellaneous

"Ouch!" – You [hurtled](/wiki/Hurtle "Hurtle") into a [wall](/wiki/Wall "Wall"), a [door](/wiki/Door "Door"), or a [tree](/wiki/Tree "Tree").[\[44\]](#cite_note-44)

"Yuck!" – A [green slime](/wiki/Green_slime "Green slime") touched you and [slimed](/wiki/Slime "Slime") you when you were already slimed; this has no effect.[\[45\]](#cite_note-45)

"Cheapskate." – You offered too little gold to an [aligned priest](/wiki/Aligned_priest "Aligned priest").[\[46\]](#cite_note-46)

"Interesting..." – You [dipped](/wiki/Dip "Dip") something to no effect.[\[47\]](#cite_note-47)

html:
One word messages

From NetHackWiki
Jump to navigation Jump to search

Contents

  • 1 Sound effects
  • 2 Player actions
    • 2.1 Kicking
    • 2.2 Dropping
    • 2.3 Locking
    • 2.4 Digging
    • 2.5 Teleporting
    • 2.6 Combat
    • 2.7 Other
  • 3 Monster noises
    • 3.1 Chatting
    • 3.2 Mail daemon
  • 4 Miscellaneous
  • 5 References

This page is a list of one-word messages.

Sound effects

"Boing!" – A creature with magic resistance was hit by a wand of striking or spell of force bolt.[1][2][3][4]

"Splat!" – An egg or melon broke. Could be due to throwing it, or it being destroyed by a force bolt or wand of striking while in inventory.[5]

"Splash!" – Venom was thrown.[6]

"Crash!" – A potion hit a monster that you can't see.[7]

"Whang!" – A boulder or iron ball hit iron bars.[8]

"Clink!" – Gold hit iron bars.[9]

"Clonk!" – Some other kind of thrown object hit iron bars.[10]

Player actions

Kicking

"Thwwpingg! – You kicked a pile of gold and sent some of them flying.[11]

"Thump!" – You kicked a pile of gold larger than 300 zorkmids and none of them went flying.[12]

"THUD!" – You kicked a large box or a chest and it did not move because it is either too heavy or against a wall.[13]

"Thump!" – You kicked some other object, but the object did not move because it is either too heavy or against a wall.[14] If a gray stone is not against the wall, then "Thump!" identifies it as a loadstone.

"Klunk!" – You kicked a sink and you are deaf.[15]

"WHAMMM!!!" – You kicked a door, but it didn't break.[16]

Dropping

"Splash!" – You dropped a heavy object (weight 10 or more) into a pool.[17]

"Plop!" – You dropped a light object (weight 9 or less) into a pool while levitating or flying over it.[18]

Locking

"Klunk!" – A spell of wizard lock or a wand of locking locked a box or a chest.[19]

"Klick!" – A spell of knock or a wand of opening unlocked a box or a chest.[20]

Digging

"Clash!" – You tried to dig outside the map area with a pick-axe.[21] (This is possible only if the diggable area of the level extends all the way to the edge of the map.)

"Clang!" – You tried to dig through iron bars with a pick-axe.[22]

Teleporting

"Sorry..." – You attempted a controlled teleport into an invalid or unsafe location,[23] or you attempted to level teleport into (or below) the Sanctum before performing the invocation.[24]

"Oops..." – You attempted a controlled level teleport while confused and ended up on a random level instead.[25][26]

Combat

"Splash!" – You hit an eyeless monster with blinding venom, or you hit a monster with blinding venom while you were blind.[27][28]

"Splat!" – You hit a monster with an ordinary egg,[29] or same as above, but you hit the monster with a cream pie.[30][31]

"Snap!" – You applied a bullwhip but hit nothing.[32]

Other

"Whoops..." – You failed to untrap a trap and just made things worse.[33]

Monster noises

"Surrender!" – A possible message from an angry soldier.[34]

"Gleep!" – A tame baby dragon hatched from an egg.[35] This is a reference to the MythAdventures series of books by Robert Asprin.

"Burrrrp!" – A monster with a digestion attack swallowed another monster.[36]

"Gasp!" / "What?" / "Why?" – A peaceful monster saw you attack another peaceful monster.[37]

Chatting

"Nevermore!" – Chat with a non-peaceful raven.[38] This is a reference to Edgar Allan Poe's poem "The Raven".

"Huh?" / "What?" / "Eh?" – Chat with a stunned or confused peaceful humanoid.[39]

"Aloha." – Chat with a peaceful tourist.[40]

Mail daemon

"Gangway!" – A message the mail daemon says when pushing monsters out of its way.[41]

"Catch!" – The mail daemon can't reach you, so it throws the scroll of mail at you.[42]

"Oops!" – You failed to pick up the scroll of mail for some reason, e.g. because you fumbled or because your inventory was full.[43]

Miscellaneous

"Ouch!" – You hurtled into a wall, a door, or a tree.[44]

"Yuck!" – A green slime touched you and slimed you when you were already slimed; this has no effect.[45]

"Cheapskate." – You offered too little gold to an aligned priest.[46]

"Interesting..." – You dipped something to no effect.[47]

References
